Package mil.nga.geopackage.style

Class PixelBounds

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.geopackage.style.PixelBounds
  • public class PixelBounds
extends Object
    Expanded pixel bounds from a point or location. Stored in directional left, up, right, and down pixels
    Since:
    6.3.0
    Author:
    osbornb
